long_description: Whether you're out on the river or up on the summit, the Jetboil Flash Cooking System gives you hot drinks or a quick, satisfying meal in just over 2 minutes. Makes 2 cups of boiling water in just over 2 minutes (average boil time specification of 5 min. represents the time required to do 2 separate boils of 0.5 liter of water). Cooking cup clips onto the burner, preventing accidental spills. Fuel canister tripod ensures overall stability. 1.0 Liter FluxRing(R) cooking cup has insulating cozy. Adjustable stainless steel burner. Push-button igniter. Color-change heat indicator. Drink-through lid with pour spout and strainer. Bottom cover doubles as a measuring cup and bowl. Stove burner and 100g fuel can (sold separately) stow inside the cup.
short_description: Whether you're out on the river or up on the summit, the Jetboil Flash Cooking System gives you hot drinks or a quick, satisfying meal in just over 2 minutes.
